Write-Up Text: The people of Australia are expressing their thoughts about the upcoming Federal Budget. While Labor MPs are disappointed that the job seeker rate may only increase for those over 55 others criticize Shadow Treasurer JEChalmers for budget blowouts and out-of-control spending. However there are calls for enhanced disaster communications in the budget including funding for a new national messaging system. There is also support for stronger advocacy for veterans navigating healthcare claims. Positive sentiments are expressed for a $72.5 million package to help over 80000 childcare educators develop skills and build qualifications.
